CustomField.description: Recipients marked as "Delegator to Acceptor" may review the document but can't accept the document. They need to forward the document to another user who may accept the document.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Recipients marked as "Delegator to Acceptor" may review the document but can't accept the document. They need to forward the document to another user who may accept the document.
CustomField.label: Enable Delegate Acceptor Role
